page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT:SWANSEA WEST
page.content: Whenever the fair is on the Recreation Ground, I go! I love the colour and noise,the helter skelter and dodgems, and the hot dogs and candyfloss. The Sugar Loop rocks gently at first, then swoops into the sky until you are dizzy. The circus comes once a year with beautiful horses and jolly clowns. We entertain our parents with plays at school. My favourite was the "Bumbles of Mumbles". My sister was in the Guides' pantomime and my brother was in the Gang Show. We go to plays in the Taliesin Theatre at the University. I saw an exciting production of "Peter Pan" by the West Glamorgan Youth Company. We used to go to the cinema, but now it is a Bingo Hall. My sister went to a Pop Concert and stayed out all night.
